title: Interdisciplinary Science Instructional Design Workshop: Principle-Based Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary science curriculum content and foundational teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service teachers to develop science lesson design competencies through interdisciplinary approaches using mobile devices

learning_goals: Three or more science problem-solving strategies can be designed using interdisciplinary integration scenarios.
Instructional materials can be created that integrate knowledge from two or more academic disciplines on digital collaboration platforms.
Interdisciplinary science lesson plans can be improved at least once by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
